tests.name: Happy Path - Form Submission & Email Generation
tests.evidence: HTTP 200, 7 emails generated with correct structure
tests.details: 7 emails with subjectLineA, subjectLineB, body fields

tests.name: Rate Limiting - 2nd Generation Returns 402
tests.evidence: 1st request: HTTP 200, 2nd request: HTTP 402 with quota_exceeded
tests.details: Error message: You have used all your free generations. Upgrade to continue.

tests.name: Form Validation - Empty Fields
tests.evidence: HTTP 400 with error: companyName is required

tests.name: Character Limits - 5000+ Char Input
tests.details: Server handles long input gracefully without truncation errors

tests.name: Session Persistence - Quota State Persists
tests.details: Session cookie maintained across all requests, quota state preserved
